column2:
When I learned that a friend of mine had not been speaking to her  
boyfriend for a week after an argument because of unfounded  
jealousy.
Made a wonderfull new friend.

I studied medicine for several semesters and at that time I  
developed a great fear of examinations. I was most afraid of my  
examination of anatomy. While other students were examined, I was  
dissecting. I was able to hear everything and was waiting with  
fear until it was my turn.
When I was nearly attackad by a man who had been chasing me.

I unfairly got a low mark on an exam and I failed to win a grant,  
since then I don't have much confidence in myself at an exam.

Receiving a postcard form my sweetheart who was abroad on  
vacation, not being at all sure if he would write me or not.

When I was about to write my Junior Certificate Exams, I received  
sad news telling me that my elder sister had passed away.
In a disco, there was a dirty little chap who punched my bottom.

After I had been away for a long time a friend told me that I had  
passed all my written examinations.
When I was ditched by my girlfriend.

A friend of mine was drunk and having an argument on the street  
with a woman, appparently his girlfriend.  I was walking on the  
other side of the street and thought that I was not supposed to  
interfere.  Later I heard that he had shot himself that evening.
The sadistinc exacution of a student in the USA.

When I was accepted as a student at the college, not having  
thought it possible.
Being chosen to do your experiment with aphasia.
In a hurry to get to lectures and the car would not start.

I felt much anger when my fahter interferred in my relations with  
another person whom I liked very much, ending something that I  
adored.

I'm afraid of driving on the special seat of a mororcycle, mainly  
with certain colleagues who by exces of self-confidence drive  
beyond limits or measure in the traffic and the main victim is  
always the person who sits behind the driver.

In a dam lake, when the water was let flow to water the plants  
and I and two other boys were near the water pit. We rescued  
ourselves only thanks to the flippers and the tyre that was with  
us.

In the student kitchen that we share, somebody drank from my  
juice pot (one litre) so that I only got one glass out of the  
whole pot.

I had a driver licence but I didn't drive for a long time, than I  
started to drive again, and had to get into hard transit and  
highways.

When my grandmother after staying with us for awhile went back  
home.

When I was young I got lost on the street and the police found me  
after a day.

My best frieend left school recently.  The next day the weather  
turned bad suddenly and the male class-mates turned off the  
lights.  I remained on the table and was scared.
When I got 1 mark in an Abnormal Psychology exam.
My boyfriend didn't turn up after promising that he was coming.
When I had to walk home in the dark for the first time.

When I was young I stole something from a shop and got caught,  
then I was taken to the police station and my parents had to come  
and get me.
Walking on a dark street with noone around.

I felt disgusted when we (family) avoided a problem which could  
be solved readily.

As a passenger in a vehicle travelling from the steep side of  
Arthur's Pass in the middle of a sleet-storm, icy roads, sheer  
chasms to one side, sheer face to the other.

I was told quite unexpectedly that one wanted me to become the  
vice-chairman of our student organisation.  I was really  
surprised and joy was the first emotion I felt, though behind it  
there was worry - how shall I succeed ?
When I entered in the University after a year of struggles.

After a jogging session I had severe abdominal cramps and this  
lead to my wanting to empty my bladder.  My friends gathered  
around me and two of them had to help me to the toilet.  I was  
ashamed at having to go to the toilet in the presence of my  
friends.

When I was detained one day in school, by the vice-principal, for  
indiscipline.

I felt sad after having had an argument with my boyfriend.  I felt  
that he did not understand me and that there was no point in  
carrying on with the relationship.
I felt very ashamed at having got a book by force from a girl.

Decided at the last minute not to do something that I said I  
would do with a person.

I lost my temper at my mother while she was teaching me.  I felt  
ashamed and sorry at having hurt my loving mother.
My boat running into another boat.

I had stolen a bottle of rum from a person who knows me well. He  
threatened to call the police if I did not pay 500 Shillings.

At the railway station, while waiting for the last train at night  
I noticed that a drunk young man was appraching me in a  
purposeful mannner.
I drink wine too often.
The smell of garlic in rush-hour bus.

When our school was raided by the pupils of the boys secondary  
school who beat us up.

I got back too late after a Sunday going out without having  
called up home to tell where I was. my mother hadn't slept the  
whole night.

A nuisance used to live in our flat a month ago. I experienced  
this feeling when I tried to chase her out.
Found out that the girl I love loves me, too.
When, for example, someone is calumnating.

Afraid I wouldn't catch the train when I was going to see my  
sweetheart.

When I don't say the truth, when I don't do a certain thing  
thanks to my laziness.

A railways officer, when asked by the ticket checker to produce  
his tickets, got very aggressive and started abusing and using  
his authority in a very wrong way.
When I broke something and a friend of mine was blamed.
When I was admitted to the University.

Some time ago I took the driving test. I did answer the  
theoretical questions very well, but I failed the practical  
driving test. It was my fault because I had not enough practice.

I had a long discussion on politics with an acquaintance.  He  
was more knowledgeable than me and I failed to explain my point  
of view and was misunderstood so I felt depressed and left.

I thought him a good friend but he tried to lie to me several times.  
Last time was the height of impudence. He promised he would come  
home but he didn't. I felt a sense of anger and insult.

Nearby the end of the year my wife and I were having a car ride,  
when it appears another vehicle, driven by a drunk driver and  
provokes an accident.

I found out that someone that I knew had someone else taking  
tests for her.
When I failed to answer a simple question.

I read a book about the situation in South-Africa, about the  
terrible violations of human rights. I was disgusted with the  
white population.

I met a girlfriend again after not seeing her for several months.  
 I saw her in a discotheque.  We do not like discotheques but we  
went there because we knew we would meet there.
When I met an elephant in the bush.

When once again I drank too much and felt very rotten the morning  
after.

When they threw my holder down on the floor, with all my notes for  
an exam inside it and they got all mixed up.

Not having owned up to the responsibility an incident where  
family car received minor damage.

I was involved in a ... attempt on a man I had developed a close  
warming relationship with. Although I knew I had done everything  
I could and that his progress of a "normal" life was poor I felt  
guilty as if I could have done more.
Getting back my Psych 140 midterm.

I was looking after my father's sheen in the forest. One day  
while playing with friends from neighbouring villages the flock  
escaped me and went into a far place. It became dark and I was  
afraid of father. I went home and hid myself.
When I go out alone at night.

When I was looking for a job I felt a lot of fear but the fear  
was greater when I found it.

I was angry when I heard that my only girl was going about with  
another man. So I decided to drop her but later the story came to  
be untrue.

When I was made to feel responsible for the emotional state a friend of  
mine was in.

I lived together with my boyfriend. One night he stayed away and  
next day he told me that he had chat up with another girl.
The girl I was seeing didn't want to have a serious relationship.
When my first girlfriend an I left each other.
I felt sad when I was despised by another person.

Without the employer's knowledge and even without any  
communication their bank accounts were changed and their personal  
accounts closed.
When I failed the ninth standard exam in school.
When I, for the first time, failed a junior exam, i.e form 3.

I saw a dead child which was not covered, it had been knocked  
down by a car.

My P.T. instructor also works as a masseur. He wanted to massage  
me, therefore I had to undress. For the first few times this was  
not easy for me; I got gradually used to it.

When I was a child, my beloved cat gave birth to four beautiful  
little kittens. Before she had them, she came up to me and I  
followed her out, then witnessed them being born.

I felt angry when I was told that I had not been selected to go  
to the University.

When two female classmates and I were having lunch, we chatted and   
cracked jokes, I was very happy.  However, I felt that I may have   
said something inappropriate which might cause them to have a bad   
impression of me.

I "cooked" the engine in my father's car - it was actually his  
fault because he hadn't fixed the temperature gauge or told me.  
When I finally got home I was absolutely screamed at and the  
anger I experienced was over the injustice of it all plus the  
huge row which developed.
Before an exam.

In a sexual experience with an unknown woman where after the  
sexual act I only could go away without looking backwards.

When a man who had a knife grabbed me and threatened me with it,    
during my holidays in Monze.

I sensed such a feeling when I understood I was admitted to the  
University. I was at home, the atmosphere was still, though I  
myself was full of suspense. I tried to do different things. When  
the telephone rang and...! Yes, of course there were other  
situations when I felt a similar feeling but I was unmindful of  
them.
When, late at night, I discovered that they had stolen my bike.

My brother told me that a person (whom I know) had insulted him.   
I am very fond of my brother, and as he himself can not get angry  
or hurt, my protectiveness was aroused and I got angry.

Sometime ago I felt very angry when my mother wrote me telling me  
that my elder sister was messing up things at home by her  
internalised aggressive attitude towards parents and her husband.

Whenever I am late, I feel ashamed of myself even though no one  
tells me anything.

My brother lost his temper and started smashing things in the  
house.  I was quite scared, that something terrible might happen,  
till the situation was brought under control.

First weekend back home after one week at Uni I scolded one of my  
sister's best friends for using our telephone. Very silly, but I  
was annoyed because she was there at a time when I needed to be  
with my family.

I was in Sierra Nevada, climbing a peak over 3,000 metres high,  
without any light and with many other problems.  I was afraid for  
my life.

Incomprehension and repression towards a child's behaviour,  
commonly not accepted, and making the child cry.
When I was caught with someone's daughter.

I phoned a friend of mine to ask her for news about the marks in  
an exam.  She told me that I had passed.
Getting into a crowded bus.

When one teacher unjustly gave me zero in a test saying that I  
was cribbing.

When I found out my cousin had been killed. I was angry at the  
world, and her murderer who was her ex-boyfriend. It was the worst  
and most hateful day of my life.
When my grandmother died.
I felt disgust of dirty.

A friend of mine said in a group that she felt lonely and  
withdrawn from everyone because of mental deficiency.

With a Manager who insists on making crude innuendos pertaining  
to sex.
When excuses are necessary and I get out of doing it myself.
My boyfriend made me a proposal.

When I worked at the life-saving service I was disgusted by a  
patient whose outward appearance was distasteful.
When I heard about the disaster in Bophal (India).
Sleeping through crew practice one Monday morning.
When my grandparents moved to another part of the town.

Political and military trnsgressions around the world, generally  
speaking. This cannot be described through this questionaire.
When my father bought me a suit.

When I inadvertantly entered the ladies room and met some girls  
on my way out.
Once again my parents distroyed a relationship.

I worked together with another student on a computer-assignment.  
She didn't do her best and didn't prepare herself for it. She  
expected me to explain it to her.

One night I had a sexual intercourse with another man.  My sexual  
desire and my curiosity had made me jump into bed with him.  I am  
ashamed of myself now.

Some boys talking about nicknames of the lecturers, and I was too  
afraid of them to stop them.

When I met a friend whom I had not seen for a long time and  
heard all about her troubles, I thought that I should have got  
in touch with her earlier.

When my middle child became very difficult to handle after the  
birth of his baby brother and I did not have any patience with  
him.
A friend which I hadn't seen for years, sent me a small present.
My grandfather's funeral.

I feel fear when I only imagine I could lose confidence in my own  
abilities and powers. A similar feeling I feel sometimes before  
an exam.
Family member survived an operation.

Yesterday, I was just about to cross the road when a country guy  
who was ahead of me spat out a mouthful of betel juice on the  
road.  It was very windy and had I not checked my speed I would  
have had a very good shower of his saliva.  Though I was not  
angry, I felt that these people were very indecent.

A close relative was at odds with a very powerful firm.  All his  
things had been taken, His dad had died a little before this  
event.  He gathhered his children and vowed to give them a good  
life with a new start - the words were hollow, he bit back his  
tears .....I asked to be excused and then went and cried in the  
loo.

I felt guilty after hearing that my girlfriend with whom I had  
spent most of my time was pregnant.

I had gone for a medical check-up at the U.T.H and failed to make  
it back on time for the C119 practical sessions at 1400 hours  
last academic year.

I faced this feeling when I realized I wasn't admitted to the  
institute in the first classifying, in spite of the high mark I  
had got at the entrance examination.

When I didn't get a certain job at Lillehammer which I wanted  
very much.
I received a letter from a distant friend.

My girlfriend disliked it when I played majong (a game of gambling).   
I expressed my regrets and when I went to see her she neglected my  
existance.  I was very angry and left in displeasure.
Getting a letter from a friend who did not write for a long time.

When I have to take exams I am very excited and have not much  
time for the housekeeping. Then my friend has to do everything.
When I gave birth to a healthy boy.

It was when my father caught me with a girl in dark corners and  
asked me what I was doing there.

At work, when an elderly man complained unjustifiably about me and  
distrusted me.
When a colleague failed to contact me at the arranged time.

I spoke with a friend on the phone who I haven't seen in many  
years. It was a joyful event to talk to him.

When I went home alone early in the morning, I had to go through  
a wood.

When I saw my name in the newspaper and I knew that I entered at  
the University.

The loss of my father as he died of a massive and sudden heart  
attack.

Went to a movie with a date, walked on the beach (in Alameda)  
spent some time afterwards in her apt.

When I was a child: I had told my mother a lie and she found it  
out.

Once I spoke without thinking very much - it was quite a  
nonsense.

When people would tell me that my ex-girlfriend was playing  
around on me.

I arranged with a friend to go skating the next day. He asked me  
to wake him up by telephone at twelve o'clock because we had come  
home late in the morning. Next day I called him - he was not at  
home. As something like that had happened to me several times  
before, I came to the conclusion that one cannot rely on anybody  
and I felt very sad.

When I blamed my failure to the bias and favouritism in the         
marking system, in fact I had not worked hard enough.

I was really angry when the President general of UNZASU was  
arrested by policemen.

When at very short notice I agreed to work in place of a friend  
who was sick, and owner of the restaurant refused to allow me a  
drink later in the evening (which is usually always available for  
workers), did not thank me, and was generally indifferent towards  
me - I felt I did not deserve this.

When I study my butt off for a midterm and still get an average  
grade.

I feel unbelievably happy about the relationship between my  
boyfriend and me, it is a reoccurring feeling.

I was teaching someone to drive and when we were about to crash I  
was scared.
When I got 1/2 out of 15 in Abnormal Psychology I felt ashamed.

We lived with 3 persons in the loft of a house. It often occurred  
that other persons again and again climbed the stairs with much  
noise. When I was studying I couldn't concentrate and got angry.

Being sexually assulted and told my friends about it (we cried  
together).

It was my turn to cook dinner.  I forgot a dish (the favourite of  
the family) in the oven and it got burnt and was uneatable.

One day my mother forced me to eat more and I refused, the next  
day she served me more rice and mutton pieces than usual.  When I  
saw this I got very angry and scolded her, and refused to eat.   
Later I felt guilty and asked her to excuse me.
My friend told me he really likes me.

I came across a woman in town who was very drunk.  She was  
swearing at everyone and carried on drinking even though she  
could hardly stand.

I was driving my car and it was very misty. It was in the night  
and I was alone in my car. I felt totally insecure, nervous and  
overstrained.
When I was selected at TISS X.
When I was molested by an old drunk man.

Most recently when the chairman at the New Zeeland Rugby Union  
announced that the All Blacks' would accept the invitation of  
South Africa to play rugby in that country.

Such a feeling springs up in me sometimes when I have meals at a  
catering establishment. It is a result either of the look of the  
food or when watching the way some people eat.

When I tell someone no. In other words when I refuse to do  
something although I could have helped him.

Defying my parents and staying out all night when I wasn't  
supposed to.
Does not apply.
When my team lost a championship.
When money was stolen from my pocket.

Before going to school I usually take something to eat right at  
school and this time I took Father's money without him knowing  
it. I felt guilty and I returned the money.
I couldn't fulfill a promise.

When summer is over and I have to leave the town where I spend my  
holidays.

I was raped once when I went through a dark alley at the back of  
our house. The man pushed me in the bushes. I fought back and  
succeeded to escape.
I cut a friend's hair in anger, without any consideration.

My grandmother is a highly authoritative person, who lives alone,  
is independent, but doesn't know to live without commanding the  
others. I hate this!

I feel shame when sometimes, (unconsciously) I behave unethically  
and without understanding the problems of the man I love.
[ I have not felt this emotion yet.]

I felt sad when a thief stole all the clothes from my friend's  
cupboard at school (boarding).

A colleague asked me for some advice and as he did not have  
enough confidence in me he asked a third person.

When I decided not to out any longer with a girl whom I liked  
quite a lot.  This made me feel low for a some time.
I stole carrots and got caught.  I had to apologize to the owner.
People not cueing in the dining hall.

When I was forced to call the telephone company about a bill  
concerning a disconnected phone belonging to my landlord.  The  
bill was four months overdue and in the meanwhile he had been  
using my phone, he seemed to have no intention of having his own  
phone reconnected.

A very good friend of mine had been away for three months. When  
we met again, we ran up to each other and embraced.
Shame of not doing something well.

The day the results of the university entrance exam was  
published, I found my canditate number and I was very excited.
A friend misunderstood me.

I stopped my car in front of a pedestrian crossing as a child was  
crossing the street.  The car driving in the next lane did not  
stop and the child got hurt.  Had I not stopped ...

I threw away an object, which belonged to a friend, because I did  
not know what to do with it. My friend was very sad about that  
and I felt guilty.

I gave some personal information to a friend of mine, and he told  
it to some others who were implicated in the affair.

When I realized that I was directing the feelings of discontent  
with myself at my partner and this way was trying to put the blame  
on him instead of sorting out my own feeliings.

I was riding with a friend in his car. At a speed of 120 km/h on  
the snow-covered motorway I would have liked to get out.

I was angry at my boyfriend who had promised to come to see me  
but did not because he spent the evening with his pals.

When I laughed at a lame man walking down the road, it looked  
funny at the time but later I felt lousy.  It was the same day  
that I had stolen some coins from my mother in the shop.

My failure to provide the appropriate emotional/spiritual level  
to a sexual relationship that had a large physical content. Born  
out of inconsistency with my personal beliefs and value shame at  
largely using this sexual partner.
Cueing in the students dining hall.

When a boy tried to fool me so he would be OK trying to show me  
that he is a gook boy.
Caused fault in V.C.R. by not following instructions carefully.
Finding out I was chosen for the English lectures.

I have done the teachers training course (B.Ed).  During our  
training I was asked to handle the ninth standard class in a boys  
school.  I was scared to face the class the first day.

Recent break-up with my girlfriend. We had been together for over  
a year. I was overseas and discovered over the phone (while I was  
at work).
Fear to come and live in Nijmegen.
A too eager approach by a dirty drunken person in a bus.
When I recently got an appartment in central Gottenburg.

I talked with a man who stammered and without controlling myself,  
I started to talk imitating him.

Making a sexual pass at my cousin with whom I have a very close  
personal relationship.

When I was told that a boy did not want to be my friend without  
any apparent reason.

I remember about an unpleasant event in relation to my mother. I  
felt guilty before her.

When I dreamt that my family was in trouble and was facing many  
difficulties.

I felt disgust with the alcohol, after I happened to see a young  
man, who was dead to the world and who wallowed on the pavement.  
This "sight" I watched from the bus.

After being depressed because of a very bad relationship, my  
first love called me and told me that he would always care for me  
no matter what I did.

When my father managed to begin a "new life" after the divorce  
from my mother; resulting in a new little sister for me.

One day a fierce looking man came to our house  and said that my  
father should apologize to him, however I was alone at home.
When I was robbed in a bus.
Being bored in school, not being able to marry and have children.

Last night, I dreamt that things that looked like monsters were  
trying to kiss me.

At school, when the only thing people my age could think of was getting  
rolling drunk. They couldn't have a good time without firstly  
getting drunk.

Leaving Melbourne to move interstate - leaving relatives and  
friends behind.
When I quarrelled with a very close friend of mine.
Not being able to do well to be chosen for the English lecture.
Someone I do not like kept talking to me.

I had some sort of a stomach virus last week and  I vomited in  
college in the morning, then in the cake shop, three times during  
the trip home and again when I got home.
A friend forgot his appointment with me.

At school, I detested the spinach gruel which had lumps of flour  
in it.

One time I was injured when I was playing football at School in  
Blantyre. I was brought to the hospital while my leg was totally  
swollen. The x-rays confirmed there was no fracture but  
collection of blood n the muscles. I feared when they started to  
incise the swollen part with surgical blade.

When my mother found me in her bedroom "stealing" sugar in her  
bedroom.  According to our customs there comes a stage when a  
child stops using the parents bedroom and I was well past that  
age.

My life-partner is going through a crisis (way of life, old-fashioned values)  
and can only get out of it by talking bold decisions.  I have  
noticed his cowardice and attempts to escape his problems by  
drinking.  I detest his drinking and his being full of self-pity.

I hit my little sisiter on the head with a stone while we were  
fighting.

After having told an authority figure a very large lie I was told  
she believed me, because she believed I had never lied to her.

My cat was sick and I had to take him to the vet to be put down -  
no one else there to do it.

Felt I had not appreciated my parents enough. Regretted the  
problems I'd caused.
Quarreling with classmates.
When someone close to me is travelling by car and is delayed.

Someone stole my ski at Vitosha and of course I was the one to be  
blamed. I left them without supervision.

Taking a trip to crocokile country I fell out of the boat and was  
motivated by fear of being eaten to perform great swimming feats.

I was disgusted when my little sister had been hit badly by her  
friends.

I once proposed my own niece whom I did not know but I discovered  
after she was my girlfriend.
When my best friend died, at the age of 16.

When a good friend with whom I had an intimate relationship made  
clear that he didn't want to continue in the same way. He choose  
his girlfriend (also a friend of mine).

I was very ashamed when I was neglected by a certain friend whom  
I was thinking loved me very much.

I went to see a movie and I went with a friend, it was really  
frightening and it made me stop and think about the world around  
me and what it is really like out there. I was frightened all  
that night.

During a meeting I said something wrong and the others laughed at  
me.

My grandfather was seriously ill, he had only a few days left to  
live. I had always loved him, but never told him. When I saw him  
for the last time, I had the feeling that I had omitted so many  
things I could not do again. - There was a fly sitting on his  
forehead and he was too weak to drive it away. I was very sad  
when I saw that.
During the short period of my unemployment about six years back.

At school a classmate who was a very good pupil had to help  
another boy who performed less well. He told him on purpose the  
wrong things so that he had to repeat a year.

When my brother hit his head and lost consciousness at the sports  
practice.  For some time he could not remember what had happened  
but he recovered later.

I had to leave my girlfriend for 4 weeks because of my studies.  
This happens frequently. The last 24 hours before my departure  
are always very depressing.

I am separated from my husband.  The way he has behaved towards  
me makes me angry.

A few years ago my mother suffered from canccer and died within  
two years.  We had not finished our studies then and could not  
bear our responsibilities as her children.  My mother had tried  
her best to take care of us but she lived in pain these two  
years.  Neither the doctor nor we could do anything for her as  
cancer is incurable.  I was very eager to replace her in  
suffernig , even die instead of her.

When I was 10/11 years old my father travelled very much for his  
work (he passed three months away from home).

When I wanted to talk to someone I liked and whom I have been  
told likes me (by his brother and even by himself) however he  
avoids any confrontation, and is vague.

When I fell in love with "X".  Overnight I felt confidence, self-esteem,     
responsible and worthwhile.

Some people were sitting outside and saying things which were not  
really true.

When I got my results - I had passed the form III exams.  I had  
not expected to do so well.

When we were in high school a few guys sometimes provoked a  
friend of mine.  They called her a pig and then grunted.  This  
irritated most of the girls.  Once, one of the girls got angry at  
my friend and said something nasty and this made me terribly  
angry.

I fell down in the bus when it braked suddenly and everybody  
started looking at me.

When my brothers had passed all of their exams and were able to   
graduate from their courses.
Forgetting an important appointment.

When I discovered that I and my friend would be licensed at the  
first call. This emotion was accompanied by a great relief. It  
was the coronation of a year of sacrifice and extrene discipline.

As a child I suffered of nightmares. Even since than, I have  
never been so anxious and fearful.

When someone tried to rape one of my best friends and he claimed  
it was her fault. He the hassled her, claimed she was loose, and  
threatened to sue her.
Emptied a bucket of water in a hospital.
When I was charmed by my relatives.

I most joyous moment was the day I got my marks.  I was very  
happy when I came to know about my marks at the M.Sc (part I)  
examination where I got 71.5%.  This was the highest marks I have  
ever scored in my life.
A case of unrequited love.
I received a letter of acceptance from UNZA.

After mischieviously ringing on the chemist's trade-entrance  
doorbell and getting caught by him.

I awoke at night and did not remember dreaming about antthing in  
particular.  I just felt oppressing fear, it was dark and all the  
others were sleeping.

When you kill yourself with work and see the number of slakers  
wandering around, doing nothing.
When my bosom friend tried to lie to me.

When my father died I felt myself alone and the fear possessed me.  
I was a child and all my sisters and brothers (8) were young.

One day I went to see a movie without my parents permission.  It  
was an adult movie and I was scared that my parents would not  
allow me to see the movie.  However after coming home I felt very  
guilty at what I had done.
When I felt that my love was returned.

I was physically assaulted and sexually abused about a year ago.  
Just the feeling that I might not get away intact, or even alive,  
produced fear.

My Uncle was beaten by his troublesome son. He fell unconscious  
and gained consciousness after some time. That time I was at  
school; this news reached me through someone.
Walking home in the dark from college.

Waking up from a bad dream in a dark night with noone else  
around.
Death of a relative.
Someone ruining someone's property just for the fun of it.
My parents came to visit me.

I had a discussion with my mother concerning my sister's divorce,  
we disagreed strongly.

When I learned I was admitted to study what I wanted most -  
floriculture (this is a narrow specialization from the general  
one).

When I cheated my father about the book allowance at university.   
He discovered that we were given K150 per year for books.

Being reunited with my family after not having seen them for 5  
years, at the airport. Sheer elation at getting through the  
"paper work" collecting bags and the anticipation of coming  
through the customs gate.

A certain Area Party Secretary came home in the morning and said  
we had to leave our home and build somewhere and the reason  
being that they wanted to establish a market. The Chairman knew  
nothing about it and was very angry.
When my term paper was evaluated.

I was waiting to receive the participation on the profits and did  
not receive it.

Tonight in bed when I realised how bad my relationship with my  
friend was.
I did not do my homework and went to see a film.

I went to practice in Sweden during summer, and I was afraid that  
I would not do well.
When I was bringing in the shopping and nearly stood on a snake.

I felt happy when I saw my brother at the bus depot after 3  
months without seing each other.

[ When someone tells me something that hurts me, I feel bad about  
it and also feel sad.]

When my niece was 3 years old she was in the living room while we  
were fixing the table for a birthday party and, as every child,  
she couldn't stay calm. She burst a balloon. When I told her to  
be quiet her father pinched her. I believe if I hadn't said anything  
this wouldn't have happened.
I lied, to be precise I cancelled a meeting with a good friend.

When my husband lied to me, tricked me and when I had to leave my  
home.

One day I had sunned my favourite shirt and was putting it back  
in the wardrobe when my younger brother snatched it from me and  
wore it.  He had not had a bath and was very dirty.  I scolded him  
but he answered back and locked himself up in a room.  I was very  
angry so I starteed kicking on the door and abusing him loudly  
and freely.

When I almost ran over a small boy who suddenly was in front of  
my car.

When I was attending an authorized demonstrationand the police  
rushed brutally at the demonstrators, without any warning.

One evening, while going to meet a friend of mine, I had to cross  
a meadow by a dark road.  There were bushes on the other side of  
the road.  The weather was damp and a bit foggy.  I heard steps  
behind me and kept speeding up my steps all the time.

I was in a dancing-tavern and the atmosphere was one of waiting  
for the end of the world.  Suddenly people began dancing wildly,  
inspired by the band.  An unbelievable experience : wonderful  
that even Finns sometimes flare up and forget to think "what  
others are thinking of me".  It was delightful to dance to one's  
heart content.

I was alone in a cottage I often stay in.  I was woken up by a  
rustling sound in the middle of the night.

When I took my entrance exams successfully and also when I got my  
school leaving certificate because the delivering ceremony was  
extremely official.

Once a female classmate told me that the clothes I wore seemed to  
be a child's clothes.  On hearing this I felt a little ashamed and  
I criticized her clothes though there was nothing wrong with  
them.
When my mother quarrelled with my aunt over me.

The death of my father, even though we had not been very close to  
each other.

I realized that a fellow member had grown spiritually.  I was the  
leader of a spiritual group and had prayed for him.  He did not  
want to burn the incense but his mother forced him to do it.

good results at school.

A friend of mine ridiculed me, telling me that I would never  
accomplish anything. I felt that he had interfered with my life.

In a tram, the ticket seller was commanding, taking the role of a  
leader, trying to emphasize her non-existent authority with undue  
strictness towards a good-humoured drunk who could not find his  
ticket at once.
When approached by a gang of youths in town at night.
Did very, very well on a Physics midterm.

The day that my boyfriend appeared at home with a pair of rings  
for our wedding.
They wanted something to happen but I didn't.

I confronted with this feeling at the Institute quite recently,  
the pedology lecturer was the cause.

A patient, to whom I had given a powerful medicine, shouted at me  
in front of many people.  I realized that he did so because he  
was very ill.
A lecturer in great detail spoke about his sexual experiences.

Not quick enough to help the lectors to catty things for the  
lecture.

A very close friend of mine was refused entrance to the medical  
school.  Her grades were very good and she should not have been  
left out.  Biased judgment !

I was living in a flat where things did not go very well for me.   
Finally, they threw me out and this prejudiced people I esteem a  
lot.
When I heard that my nephew had passed away.
When I shot a bird in the head with a shotgun.

I was in a restaurant with my boyfriend when I saw my best female  
friend after not seeing her for two weeks.  We rejoyced, hugged  
and had a long talk.
[ After an examine I had been satisfied with.]

When last year in college I received the award "Best Student of the Year",

When the result of the certificate exam was announced.  I was  
surprised and happy as the result was better than I had  
expected.

One time I felt guilty when I told one of my previous boyfriends  
we were through just because I never felt like having one at that  
particular time.

mother had been knocked down by a car at the street crossing and

as my father and my mother had gone out together to buy lunch  
boxes.  However I immediately ran to the scene of the accident.

I felt disgust toward meat when I felt sick with the steak after  
a week only on meat.

I didn't do an important job and it had an adverse effect on  
other people.

While I was pushing a court roller out of a ditch, I slipped and  
fell down and the roller rolled back towards me -down slope-It is

When I had not understood anything after a lecture.

When I was with the girl I love very much, for the graduatiion  
ball.
When I failed an exam unfairly.

Arriving in New Zealand as a teenager - first overseas trip -  
something "exhilarating" about the change of scenery etc.

This monday I took a Math 1BS test and flunked for the second  
time.

Truely, I got very ashamed when my brother was sent out of  
Business Machines Limited Company due to improper handling of the  
office equipment in Sales Services.

I was on the Inter Rail in Naples alone. After an evening in a  
restaurant I was going back to the hotel when a prostitute

walking I felt that I was being followed by someone.

A "higher status" colleague of mine despised my attitude and  
organization of work.
When I was admitted to the University.

When my friend promised that she would come to my place, and did

When I passed and qualified for the university.
I saw a lot of starving people in a T.V news report.

When I lost the notes of the lecturer I had borrowed from my  
friend.

When I had not prepared my contribution to the group as  
thoroughly as the other members, with the result that the

I've always defended my sister when needed, at the expense of my  
brother. This has led to feelings of guilt towards him.

Whenever I read or think about the way people treat animals and  
nature.

When a person whom I loved and admired a lot died.  I felt empty,

When my brother was selected to the University of Malawi (the

My mother and my sister carried on picking at me all day long for

I missed an opportunity to go abroad because of some silly

Not applicable.

lost her purse and she was very nervous.  Five of us had to go

I heard her describing how her purse looked.  I realized that I  
had seen her purse on the floor and had not wanted to do any  
thing about it.

My friend came to see me after she had stayed abroad. I waited at  
the station.
When I was selected for the university.

When I embarrassed a friend by asking him aloud if a certain  
person was "the source of gossip" he told me about, while that

The period when I was pregnant and when I gave birth to my son.

After my shoulder operation, I woke up in the hospital room  
alone. I was in pain and was still under heavy medications. I  
could not find my parents.
Someone told a lie that I had stolen his money.

I went singing with a group of young people on January 6th (The  
three Magi), a local custom called "star singing". One of the girls, my

angry thinking of the consequences.
China not doing well in the Asian Olympic games.

My mother accused me of not visiting her enough when she was in  
hospital for an eye operation.

When I entered the wound intensive care at the Central Hospital  
in Blantyre which was stinking.
Having my luggage checked at Customs.

In a lift a drunken, fat and untidy man tried to make advances at  
me.
The day I left my first girlfriend.

When I dropped a bottle in the state liquor store and everyboby

I have high expectations for my future but if I pursue the  
subject in this manner I will not attain this.

I promised a friend that I would return a book to it's owner for  
him , but I forgot to do it.

When a girl did not answer a question, concerning my love for  
her, put forward to her.
My sister was afraid of her husband.

Describing to mother how a hole in the wall had appeared while I

I and my cousin went to a filmshow at night. We went without  
making it known to my mother. While we were there at interval, I  
came across my mother just close to where we sat.

Once at a camp a classmate criticized me in front of others.  Now  
I find that this classmate is very disgusting.
Lecturers being unfair to me in reports.

There was a family fight in my house some time back.  My uncle  
had given me a watch as a present and I lost it.  During the  
fight he accused me of having sold the watch.  I was disgusted at  
his false accusations.
Failing an examn.

I gave tutorial to a student and I found that he was lazy, he did  
not pay attention to what I taught.  He did some easy questions  
wrong deliberately.

I had been forced to get together with strange and disgusting  
classmates.  The things they talked about disgusted me and made  
me feel ill at ease.  I knew that I would feel unhappy if I  
stayed there but I was defeated by the social norms.

When I argue with my boyfriend, I feel as though he feels  
superior to me.
Suddenly met someone in the biology building at night.

Mary's Sec. School. I was happy at Chichiri as a day scholer and

meant parting with my friends as well as my boyfriend for the  
first time.
When one has been unjust, stupid towards someone else.

I had called a boy who had dated me, and told him that I was ill,  
while, actually, I didn't want to go out with him, later on, he asked  
me if I was feeling better, then I felt ashamed.
When my father was saved from a severe work accident.

I read about the national and social spirit and self-discipline  
of the people of developed coutries like U.S.A, England, France,  
Germany etc.  Comparing this to the Indian people I felt guilty  
as they have no national spirit or self-discipline.

I was badly beaten up by one of my friends during a wedding  
party.
When I saw a spider.
When one is alone and knows that all the others are celebrating.

Doctors ignored relative who complained about pain, and is now  
dying of cancer.

A serious drug error while nursing that I knew I was responsible  
for (patient lived, no complications fortunately).

Achieving my goal at a swim meet. I worked toward the goal for 9  
yrs. I was capable of achieving it, but I didn't know when.
Some boys not cueing in the dining hall.

When I went to see the result of an exam and saw that I had  
failed.

A friend unjustly put the blame on me to relieve his conscience  
and also spread lies for the same purpose.

Shifted from Melbourne to Brisbane. All my old school friends  
gave me a party and I had to say good-bye to them all.

I had a quarrel with my father. He was depressed, because  
somebody had treated him injustly. As we had an argument, it was  
impossible for me to help him.
Finding out that I was deceived by a friend.

I had had a farewell party at the place where I had been working  
for a year.  That night I could not fall off to sleep.  I was sad  
thinking that I would not see my nice fellow workers again.

I was so excited once that I told my classmate that she was old,  
this hurt her and I felt guilty.
One day I went to see a rather disagreeable film (X).

When I feel lonely, perhaps because I have to study a lot and I  
am shut up in my appartment.  Nothing happens in particular  
because there is no time for anything else.
The physical appearance of a meal.
Finding out my best friend cannot go to the English lectures.

When I learnt that the girl I had impregnated was in hospital and  
was on the verge of dying as she had refused to accept the  
responsibility of her pregnancy and had wanted to commit suicide.

brought along a lamp which was not working very well.  The door  
made strange sounds and I was sure that strange things were  
happening.  The most terrifying bit was that there were many  
wardrobes in the hut and everytime that I looked in the glass of  
the wardrobe I felt that there were "objects" behind me.   The  
whole night was spent in fear and restlessness.

I had to call somebody between 12 and 12:30. As I had no  
possibility to call him at this time, I did not do it until 3  
p.m.

When I was a child I hid under the sheets out of fear of  
darkness.

When my husband got picked up in our new car for drunken driving.  
We had made a pact the other would not drink and so therefore  
would be the driver for the evening etc. I was not present at the  
time.

I had been telling lies and people discovered instantly that I  
was telling lies. I felt very shameful and I felt like  
disappearing from people.

Someone, who was sitting very close to me, was smoknig in the  
compartment of an air conditioned mini-bus.

In a course I thought that I deserved good marks but I only got  
ordinary marks with no justification as to why I was given these  
marks.
When I hit my young sister without a valid reason.

When I was mistakenly accused of being a thief when I accidently  
gave a fake coin at a counter.  I realized this before I handed  
over the coin, but the man called me a thief and called a  
witness.

Hearing that I had been successful in getting a position whereby  
my financial, physical, spiritual and emotional needs will be  
well catered for. This position fulfils a lot of my aims for the  
last five years of my life.

At school, I had acted against the will of the group, and the  
next day they promised to take revenge on me.

Crossing a street of several ways the cars began to move and I  
thought that I was going to be trampled.

Looking up end-of-semester results, and finding I'd failed three  
out of seven (subjects).

On Christmas eve I went to a classmate's home with other  
classmates.  The next morning when I came out of the toilet she  
said something and I did not understand what she was saying.   
When she pointed at my trousers I discovered that I had forgotten  
to zip them up.  I rushed back to the toilet but by the time the  
others had guessed what had happened.

I had not eaten anything for 2 days to be able to pay the fine  
for my fiancT. But he stayed in another town and spent one  
thousand shillings in the restaurant during the same time.
A close friend of mine had not contacted me for a long time.

When I found one of my new pullovers wrinkled inside the  
wardrobe.  My brother had done it.

Someone told me that he would stay at my home for one night.  
Therefore I made big efforts to make everything ok (food). One day  
before he cancelled the appointment because he had to go to  
church with his parents.

I used to have two boyfriends in the past. Then one of them  
wanted to get engaged to me. I agreed but was guilt-conscious for  
disappointing the other one.

I felt angry when I failed in an exam about which I knew quite a

Some people not cueing in the dining hall.
Slept with someone close to my girlfriend and myself.

I came out of the house at 7:20 am Monday morning getting ready t  
go to school and fight for a parking when I saw my car had a flat  
tire.
When, after a long time, I saw a girl with whom I was in love.

When I lost my driving license because I had been driving while  
under the influence of alcool.

I recently became sexually involved with my sister's lover. I  
care for him very much, but I am ashamed of the hurt I may cause  
her.
I was watching a sad film and it affected me deeply.

Once in a public ladies room, I opened the door of a cubicle that  
was taken, although it was not locked.

When the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the final  
of the Europe Cup at Athens.

In Biarritz (the South of France) I met some English students  
who, especially for me, went to Paris and gave me food, while I  
didn't have any more money.
When my brother's visa for the U.S.A got cancelled.
A murder.

When I realized that I had a hole in my trousers after having gone  
for a walk.

When before the last exam I have taken, I went out instead of  
studying.

When I received the first year results as the first year had  
involved a lot of work and I was very pleased when I got the  
results.

I used to pinch change from my father's mantlepiece (never my  
mother - she didn't get enough housekeeping) and then I'd feel  
when we went to church as a family I'd felt awkward cos I felt  
I'm expected to go to communion and I would but I was afraid and  
guilty 'cos I committed a mortal sin.

My joy knew no bounds when I was selected for a job even before  
having finished my studies.
I failed an exam which I thought I would certainly pass.

Finding out that the university police was afraid to stop the  
foreign students playing loud music (China's shame).
When I was caught going out with another girl by my girlfriend.
When one of my cat died of a disease.

Some time ago a man tried to teach me something. "Tried" because  
it is very difficult to teach somebody when you yourself are not  
competent and cultured.

Saw someone who picked up a cigarette from the floor and smoked  
it.

My flatmate and close friend living and sleeping with another

My girlfriend who had spent 6 months abroad broke off our

Old man in hospital, hollow-cheeked, only one half of his nose

When I got married.
Getting into this university.
When I found my girl in bed with another man.
My roommate's sister committed suicide.

I felt disgust about all my friends. After having done a great

Recently, I left my bag in the car of someone who picked me up

lived (I succeeded).

I told my primary teacher I hadn't done my homework as my mother

I was afraid to walk through the forest one day when I dropped

I felt disgust with a man I had trusted and respected, to whose

When my grandmother came to stay with us permanently as she is a

When I passed the grade 7 exam.

Recently a good friend only called me when he needed something.

When my mother left for Kenya.
When my aunt died.
Telling white lies.

A letter from my boyfriend began in such a way that I thought he

Once, when I was very young, my mother left me alone in the  
house and came back very late.

The saddest moment in my life was when I lost my younger sister a

A classmate damaged ma iron and tried to hide the damage.

For the girl who halped me go on living and made me happy - when  
I don't see her even for two or three days.
The man I am going around with gave me a very special present.

When I passed the university entrance exam.  I had thus finished  
with a difficult period of my life and I was about to begin one

When I broke up my relationship with my former girlfriend as she  
would ask me irrelevant quetions about my past.

When my friend ended up pregnant by a gentleman whom I considered  
to be good and faithful but he ended up neglecting her and not  
bothering about her.

In my opinion guilt is a feeling which goes together with shame.  
Here then I refer to the situation of guilt.

I was terribly upset when my kitten got hit by a car. He didn't  
die, but for several weeks we thought he might have to be put  
down.

Some time ago a close relative of mine got off cheap with the  
worst.
When I heard that my friend had started drinking beer.

I won the first prize at the science fair, the first of the kind  
at school and I was only in form II then.

Being subject to unfair treatment in a working group, someone  
"bending the rules" was protected by the boss. This resulted in

When I am alone and listen to a song which I like very much and  
which I had listened before together with friends.

When my aunt took her own life, I felt guity for not  
understanding that she needed support.

The sports fishermen who catch gulls instead of fish with their hooks.  
  It is often a mistake but it makes me angry.

Always when I get separated from my friends and relatives from my  
home town.
A wurm dropped on my head.

When I learned that my parents were going abroad and leaving me  
alone for a few years.

Being miserable in a party when other people are friendly and  
happy.
The death of a relative, friend, or someone I esteem.

The surname of my brother was different from ours.  He often  
grinned at home and provoked others for the pleasure of it.  This  
made me angry.

Brother provoked anger. It was when mother and father were away  
and we had to look after ourselves. He accused me of being  
selfish and a snob.

My girlfriend left the house in which we lived together a few  
months ago. This made me very sad.

When I wished secretly and lied to a friend of mine because I  
didn't want her to stay in my house on the beach (as she always

We had fixed time for practice as we had to participate in the  
inter-department song contest.  I arrived and found that there  
was nobody there.  When I went to the canteen I found them eating  
lunch.  I was so angry that I aired my greviances to one of them

When I was at a party I met an old friend from an adult  
education course.  We had not met for 2 years but had both thought  
a lot about each other.  A wonderful experience.

When I was caught with another man's wife.  I had taken the

I was forced to stay in the canteen and eat the food that I had  
not asked for but got it anyway.

At a party I met a girl who drew me to her, told me some nonsense  
and always wanted to kiss me.

I was alone at home, a man forced the front door which was  
locked, forced and tried to open a window.

When I saw my 18 year old son grab an oxygen mask as he had  
breathing difficulties.  I had a bad conscience because I had not  
stopped smoking.  Medication for the dilation of his breathing  
tubes also caused a sense of guilt in me.

When I made love with someone who I didn't really love. Sometimes  
I even considered him unlikable.

I was disgusted with my girlfriend's behaviour. She was going out  
with other boys who were also my friends.

Discovering a good friend had lied to me, resulting in a  
detrimental relationship with another person.

I was coming home from a relative's place and it was about  
9.30/10 P.M.  I felt slightly apprehensive when I got off the bus  
and started walking towards my place.  I was confident that  
nothing would happen to me, yet there was this slight feeling of  
fear.

I had a girlfriend who lived several kilometers away from my  
home. One day she wrote me that she'd visit me. On her way she

her lying in a bed in the hospital.

For a medical check-up, we - boys and girls - had to take off our  
clothes with the exception of our underwear. Then we had to go  
into another classroom where older pupils were sitting and  
staring at us.

When India won the Prudential cup by beating West-Indies in the

the competition.
When I had a good result in the certificate examination.

A friend of mine gave birth to a child. Very dangerous delivery.  
I was afraid for her and for the baby.

Coming home one night - my sister was home, and had been drinking  
heavily and started picking arguments.
Won a prize for effort.

I had fear of my father (parents) when I first became pregnant. I  
was afraid of delivery itself and whether I would give birth to a  
stiiborn or a baby.
The time that I had to put my dog to sleep.

When my sister left to go home, in Sweden, after the Christmas  
Holidays.
When, as a child, I was nearly knocked down by a car.

I felt disgust after watching a picture on television about  
torturing political prisoners in India (this happened in the  
India of Indira Ghandi).

One night, I went out with some friends for dinner and I did not  
tell my parents that I would come back late.  I thought of  
phoning but in the end I did not.  When I arrived home, my  
parents were very worried.

In 1977 when my friend was caught by a crocodile.  We were  
swimming in a river on whose banks our primary school was  
situated.  When my friend was caught, he was on the banks of the  
river and some of us were still in the middle of the river.  I  
was very frightened.
When I was jumped by three men in a deserted area.

I felt it when I saw our headmaster blushed ingratiating himself  
with high ranking officials.

When a big angry dog put its snout on my arm and had I made one  
movement it would have bitten me.

During a summer holiday at a bar I happened to see a dead to the  
world woman.

I was nailed. I lied in connection with a book which I took from  
the library, because I had to keep it for a longer time.
I thought I had taken a decision but I hesitated.

In secondary school I had a class-mate who talked too much.    
Once we went to the cinema after school and she sat next to me and  
commented the movie throughout  - very disgusting.
Can't remember exact example.

My brother came to tell me about some problems we had in the   
family.  I felt sad because I thought that if my mother had not  
gone away when this brother was younger, things would have been  
different.

I feel always guilty before my parents when I come home and have  
to tell them I have failed an exam.

I was given an exam which I thought did not measure at all my  
ability or my knowledge of the subject.

In the bus I was sitting next to a colleage who was drunk and  
behaved in keeping with his state.

A friend asked to borrow my notes and I did not give them away  
(my notes too badly written)

I feel this feeling at one and the same degree when I am not  
prepared to overcome certain obstacle in my life.

When I found out that I had passed the last two exams by a  
margin of three marks.

When I had gone to a school picnic and was left behind in the  
forest.

I broke a cup and put it back without telling anyone about it and  
someone almost got blamed for it, then it was discovered that it  
was me who had broken it.
Swearing in public.

At one point in a relationship, my boyfriend was seeing an old  
flame more than me. At our confrontation tears were shed.

My first girlfriend. I had the feeling that she was going out  
with me only because of my defect.

When reading a newspaper story of a man who had committed  
incestuous acts on his two-year old child - the thought that  
anyone could do such a thing is abhorrent to me.

While drinking a soft drink, I had the impression of swallowing    
a piece of glass so I went to the district hospital and got  
admitted there.
When I see someone vomitting.

I slipped and fell in to a puddle and people started looking at  
me.

When I was at school, no one thought I could pass my MCE so at  
the end of the year my name was announced on the radio that I had  
passed. I was the happiest person.

One morning I was standing at the bus-stop and the bus passed by  
without stopping, even though there were only 8-10 passengers  
inside.  I felt angry at the rude behaviour of the bus driver and   
conductor.

I was at home alone when I realized that a young roe approached  
our house. I hid because I did not want to frighten it. It  
limped. Some time later, when I thought that it had already run  
away, I saw it lying on our terrace. I came nearer and saw that  
it was terribly wounded. I informed the ranger who said that the  
roe must have been attacked by dogs. He had to shoot it.

When I lied to my girlfriend, telling her that I had passed an  
exam, when I actually did not even take it.

I tried to pass an examination particularly well, but I did it  
worse than ever. I felt ashamed.

I was forced to go to a party with someone I didn't love and he  
was telling people that I was his girlfriend.
When I had to come back from my village last Christmas.
First anatomy lesson.

Saw my class leader acting like a God when he chose people to go  
to your English lectures.
When I was selected to the university of Zambia.
When I passed standard 8 exams I jumped, rolled over the ground.

When someone ignores what I am saying or doesn't let me have my  
point of view and they monopolise a conversation.

When I was a Sr. in HS. one of the class counselors died of  
hepatitis. She was very sensitive. She knew my shyness and drew  
me out to improve myself image. I missed her funeral - so I could  
not publically grieve. My parents didn't understand.

I was sitting in a restaurant with friends. They asked me  
something which they thought I should know. Actually I know it,  
but at that time I was not able to remember it.

While watching a religious film, I got very excited and made a  
number of comments which were reproached to me by an elderly  
person who respected me.

When going out in the weekend I have to bike 5 kilometers through  
lonely and dark polders, then I always have terrifying fantasies.

The first time I slept at my boyfriends house and had to walk  
down the hall to the shower in front of his housemates. I felt  
they were judging me.
When I did not give back a text book to a friend in time.

When I did bad on a chamistry midterm which I could have done  
well.

When I lied last week. I lied to someone to get info. for a  
paper I was writing. I told her that the info. was for a  
newspaper article. I was afraid if I told the truth she wouldn't  
help me.
When my father was ill and was waiting for the results of his tests.

When I wasn't well prepared for a terminal exam and the teacher  
tried to give me a three by asking me some very easy questions. I  
burned with shame then.

I always feel ashamed when I do not succeed in accomplishing  
something in which I had put in all my efforts.
Before an exam which I, finally did not take.
I was angry when my abilities of a singer were underestimated.

I was alone in my room at the boarding house when at 12 o'clock  
someone knocked violently on the door.
Being unable to stop urinating on the bus.

Accidentally dropped a friends camera flash, so that it was  
broken.

When I think about my family (parents, brothers, sisters) guilt  
is a part of my feelings.

There is one thing which makes me feel shameful,  when I see  
friends of my age group working and earning a lot, when I am  
still studying.  A friend I met a week ago after a period of 5  
years is earning more than Rs 3000/ month.

My room-mate was drunk, he vomited on the floor and fell face  
down on the vomit nearly choking himself to death.  Then he  
fainted and so I called the first aid.

My grandmother wanted me to help her. I was driving a tractor  
pulling a dead branch off a tree. I told her she didn't respect  
me.

I felt fear when once I was asleep and dreamed that I was dying  
asfixiated by a cardiac attack, I was afraid and woke up  
desperate. Altough I wasn't afraid of death I was afraid.
Helping in the nursery school.

A friend of mine told other people that I was a slattern (because  
of an occurence that had happened some time ago). When I heard  
about that I was very angry.

Standing in a crowed shop or in a closed room with too much  
people in it. This gives me a fearful experience.

A situation of overt unfairness, manipulation of people and its  
consequences.
When I found out that someone close to me was flirting around.
The stories about the way my grandmother treated my mother.

I was coming back home with my mother when the purse I was  
carrying got stolen.  It was done so swifty that I did not  
realize what had happened till much later.  A lot of money and the  
keys of the house were lost.  I was guilt ridden at my  
carelessness.  I felt terrible as I do not normally loose things  
and this was quite important, especially the keys.

A neighbour complained about smoke from my backyard incinerator  
entering his house after a change of wind direction. I lit the  
fire after originally checking that the wind would not blow the  
smoke in that direction.

It was at Malawi Army, Dormer Squadron, when some of my workmates  
got promoted to Seargents (sgts); we were having similar  
Ranks.

My mother had fallen down from a ladder when she had been  
gathering cherries. Her back was hurt. Just when I arrived, I saw  
people of the life-saving service giving her medical care.

Family discord and uneasiness due to something I did not  
communicate on time.
When I was admitted to the Sofia University.

Whenever my father smokes the smell makes me feel very  
uncomfortable.  He never listens to my complaints and I curse him  
furiously in my mind.  I cannot solve this problem by violence  
because of traditional moral values.

My aunt phoned me to ask me why I had refused the her invitation  
to dinner at her home on the New Year's Eve.

That day I was alone at home after coming home from school.  I did  
not know where everyone else had gone, I kept waiting for them to  
come back and nobody came.  It was getting very late and I was  
terrified.

I didn't do very well on a midterm and I'm disgusted with myself  
because I was prepared and thought I did well.

When I was told that my daughter, who is at a boarding school,

Being threatened by another person.

On the last day of my school life I was very sad, specially on  
the farewell party day.  I felt sad to leave behind my beloved  
teachers and friends.

When I was told that the brother who was staying with me would  
not go to the training school that year but only the year after.

A sense of guilt before my parents when I had to discountinue my

When I ate a rotten apple.

Fear overwhelmed me when right against the car I was in I saw

I was very sad when my first boyfriend finished our relationship.

It was the time when I was in no position to secure a Ist class

When my aunt told me angrily that I was a good-for-nothing and  
she was fed up with my behaviour.
[ When mix was coming from column for several days.]

I had an argument with my boyfriend.  It was my fault but my

I was to take part in a cocktail party on the occasion of our  
national holiday as a servant.

My baby sister was 2-3 months old and when I was trying to get  
her on my back, she slipped and fell.

In the real sense of the word I experienced fear in my first  
months in the army. During my first night of duty. The cause for  
all this was a bear. I became panic sticken (may be for the first  
time) and even forgot that I had a gun.
My car skidded on the wet street.

I was sleeping in my room but woke in the middle of the night to  
think I could hear noises and see shadows moving. I felt that  
someone was in the house.
The event which got me angry got also an aversion in me.

During an argument with my brother, I behaved rather  
intransigently, even cruelly, wishing to morally hurt the "person"  
opposed to me.

Practicing wind-surf my body was caught under the sail. On trying  
to get out my leg was caught in the lashing. I was afraid of  
dying by asphixia.

Some persons, who are important for me, came to see me and I had  
not washed the dishes.

It happened that my brother promised to give me money for school  
and then he told me that he had failed to fulfil his promise a  
day before school started. I became so angry for I thought my  
future would be ruined.
When I almost walked on a snake.

With the girl whom I may be loved truly. When she refused to come  
with me to an occasion (she was from another town).

When a professor caught me absent-minded and not paying attention  
to what he was saying.

I was sitting on an electric swing, suddenly the machine went  
out of order while I was still in the upward position.

I was dominated by a certain person and even though I knew it I  
could not change my own reactions.

When my uncle gave me my first year's results.  I opened the

[ When I do not get any co-operation from my friends/partners.]

Now that the 49ers are winners, the fans are coming out of the  
woodwork and jumping on the bandwagon and that disgusts me.
I saw a report on T.V news on apartheid in South Africa.

My flatmate was asking questions about my relationship with my  
boyfriend, whether I wasn't treating him as unfairly as I claimed  
he'd been treating me. As a result, I was angered, and became  
defensive.

When I heard that I had passed Primary School Leaving Certificate  
and was selected to go for Secondary education.

When I was reading a book.  It had nothing to do with the book  
itself but with the disagreable smell of the pages of the book.
When a friend of me came for an unexpected visit.

When I got my fingers stuck in one of the side holes of the door,  
in the tube.

I came across a girl at the school bus-stop, I had seen her  
several friends as she was a friend's friend.  However my friend  
had never introduced me to her and when she got off the bus I  
smiled at her but she did not respond pretending not to have seen  
me.  Her arrogant behaviour made me sick and angry.

Eating biscuits and drinking Milo (Chocolate energy drink made  
with milk and usually drunk warm) with my friend at College. We  
get on really well, don't withold any feelings about each other's  
friends and are pretty good at cheering each other up when we are  
homesick.
I received a letter from a friend whom I was missing
Canoeing across harbour in winds - 20 knots and rising seas.

I had intercourse with someone and then I realized that what I  
had done was wrong and it disgusted me.

I travelled on a bus and I forgot to punch the ticket. A ticket  
collector came in and I had to pay the fine. I did it with a feeling  
of shame.

A  group of youngsters dressed in fads talked foul language on a  
bus.  They also insulted the  pedestrians on the road and were  
impolite to the passengers of the bus.

A ex-boyfriend tried to prejudice me before my fiancT and his  
family saying things about me that let his family worried. We had  
to postpone our wedding and we were already using our wedding  
rings. To be honest I didn't feel just anger, I felt hate.
Insulted by other people in the shop.

I'm afraid of not being able to go to the school I want because  
of suffering grades.
Telling my parents that I did not well in an examn.

I had an appointment with a friend. I promised him to meet with  
him, but at last I did not without having informed him.
When I failed my S.S.C exam.

The day my fiancee told me that it was bad that I could not write  
my mother tongue.

While tramping on a narrow path two of us were confronted by a  
woman with two snarling dogs, demanding we get off the property -  
via a flooded river !
Korean judges cheating.

I feel afraid of the way a great friend looks at me, and also a  
little afraid of the directions that it's going.
[ I was thinking about death.]

I offended a person who had done much for me and who had helped  
me for everything.

Sitting on the bus seats supposed for disabled people, children  
and old people (by mistake)
Someone had stolen an article from a library journal.
The morning after a wild party.
When I felt alone and without love.
During my last exam.

When a colleague asked me for help at work, despite the fact  
that he had more time to do it than I had.

About two years ago my girlfriend suggested that we separate.

say such things.  The reason she gave me was that we were not  
suited for each other.
Falling over.

In 1960,  I was going to a school which was near my village and I

My parents put pressure on me to buy clothes, when I would not

I stayed alone in the dark at night in the mountain, waiting for

I was cold to my sister without meaning it, just because I was  
upset and frustated.

A and I were walking along the new Asia stairway to the Chung Chi  
college for our lecture and I saw him with her.  He put one arm  
around her shoulder and laugher brightly and joyfully.  I did not

interest of talking to A disappeared and I just wanted to remain

to F.  I should have expected this to happen.

I wrote an Exam and happened to have not done as well as I  
thought I would. I was angry to myself for not having done so  
well.
Marriage crises.  Boredom.

I got angry when I learned how short a time we had to prepare for

A teacher at my former secondary school forced my darling to

I had been guilty of gossiping and blaming others, and one of my

When I went to visit a relative and saw how messy and dirty his

People impolite with me because I did not get a good report.

When a man, a stranger to me, personally insulted a close woman  
friend of mine in public.
Whenever I think of enrolling in Organic Chemistry.

In a very crowded shop I was distracted and missed my turn in the  
queue.  A woman who was behind me began to shout at me asking me  
either to pay more attention or to leave.
I felt fear when my mother was heavily ill.

A classmate told me I must have bribed the class leader to let me  
go to your English lecture.
Doing well in an examn.

In a dark street at 4 o'clock in the night and there was  
complete silence.

Once our school class went skiing. On a steep slope a boy  
standing behind me lost his balance, fell down and drew me with  
him. I slided down the whole slope. At about 1 m distance from a  
tree I could stop.
I lost my way on a trip in the mountains.
Being asked to go out by someone I care.
The same event described under "shame".

Years ago I fell in love for the first time. as natural for every  
school-girl I was day-dreaming. Later (after 3 years) we left  
each other. No one was to blame but I felt deep sadness. Even now  
I remember about it quite often.
Getting my accentance letter from CAL.
When I did not buy what I had promised to.

I felt disgusted when somebody told me that my previous boyfriend  
was her boyfriend.

When I was concentrating on my work, my friend disturbed me  
continously.  I asked him to stop but in vain.

When I was a child I often quarrelled with my younger sister.  
Once I became so angry that I slapped her in the face. She cried  
and shouted so that my mother came in and scolded me.
When my boyfriend and I made up.
When I was accepted as a student.

When I had promised to do some washing for my mother and I did  
not do it.  She did it herself despite her being ill.  I felt  
very guilty.

The last time I had to phone the Registry, after having called  
them so many times in the last few days.

When I didn't meet an appointment I had made. The person phoned  
me but I thought of something (I told I was ill) so that I didn't  
have to go.

I was seriously injured in a road accident. The very first steps

being alive.

[ One day I arrived home rather tired and found the house..... In

answer.]
When I realized that I loved someone of the opposite sex.

When I entered the dissecting room for the anatomy class and saw

One fears many things, for example one fears going to the

I was watching T.V with my parents and some pornographic scenes

When, after a long time of searching I got my first job.
When the girl I loved turned me down.

During class one day I walked out of the class.  The

I found I was pregnant and unmarried.
My roommate's lack of consideration of me.

The day I got a telegram telling me that I had been selected for

I was very happy when I discovered that I had passed my first

I was overwhelmed with joy when I received the acceptance letter

My mother told me that I could not go to the mountains.  Despite

A friend of mine felt bad because of something I had done to

When I learnt that I had to repeat the first year, I found the

like.  The first week we were at loggerheads and our conversation

When I had a Latin examination in school.

When our religion teacher presented shocking sectarian thoughts  
and doom's day as official teaching.
Someone spread rumours about me.
When I wanted to kiss a friend and didn't succeed, I felt shame.

When I was a child, I thought that I had to be ashamed when  
asking and doing certain forbidden things.

I had the unexpected possibility to see a friend I like very  
much.
Talking to someone I disliked.

I tried my level best to care for my client, I took an  
appointment with a doctor and before meeting the doctor he  
expired - a poor small boy from Uttar Pradesh.

I feel shy to show all my worth when I work for the first time

I tried to swindle a jeweller because my watch was broken and I  
wanted to have it repaired it was a pity but they detected it.

I did not like it when a little girl was crying for her dead  
mother and was calling her by her name.  I was sad.
Caught cheating on a diet.

I was alone at home, in bed reading a womens' magazine in which

itching and I stretched my hand to scratch and I felt another  
strange hand. (later I realized that it was the corner of the  
blanket)
When I could not do anything because of a bad back.

I told some acquaintances of mine something that I regretted  
later.

I was in my village when a bull jumped over a fence and started  
chasing my friends and me.  We were very frightened till we  
climbed up a tree.
Haven't felt shame for ages.

In 1982, I was annoyed at an uncle who was drunk and was beating  
up his old father.  He claimed that the father was responsible  
for his guardian's failure.

After the term exams I happened to meet a person that I respect  
and of whom I think very highly. It was nice that although we see  
each other rarely he had not forgotten me.

I think I have hardly had a situation where I felt disgusted.  
Perhaps once, when I saw a big spider.

I was driving my parents' car into a carpark in front of a shop  
we own, and scraped the corner of the front panel on the back  
corner of my father's utility. I didn't tell anyone, I lied about

Stopped at a Fast Food shop with friends and a few locals wanted

For example, when I have promised something but I haven't  
fulfilled it.
Watching China winning the Asian Olympic games.

I had to go to the dentist's. When he touched my tooth with his

Before I had a tooth pulled out.  I was very upset and ill.
When I learned that two of my friends had had a serious car accident.

During lunch with some classmates, a priest was also there.  He

several times and it was full of crumbs.

When my mother betrayed me by obtaining money from my husband  
when we were separated - pending divorce.

Recent break-up of seriors long-term relationship, helped along  
by would-be  in-laws.

I feared that I would have to describe my sexual life to an

My friend still trusts me as a friend.
When colliding with my car. I myself was to blame.

While doing some calculation exercises, I neglected a part of it,

A man in a car was following me when I went running early one

Two years back someone invited me to be the tutor of her

When I entered university the girl's parents suggested that I be

On TV I saw a report about church in Amerika. A priest was shown

Winning Queensland Chess Championship.

When my co-resident opened the bathroom door while I was bathing  
inside.
When I nearly got my fiancee pregnant.

My father was away from home and he did not come back when he was

Getting into this university to do medicine.

When I took the first year university exams and made a lot of  
mistakes in the P110 exam.  I was afraid of failing and thus

When I got a first class in the twelveth standard exams, I was very

It was when I was selected to go to a Secondary school to start  
form I.
A dear friend was removed from the division whre I work.
I won a sport contest.

I felt disgusted when my appointment to meet the E.N.T.

I wanted to take something from under my bed. While doing this I

When I went to see the dead body of my uncle.  This was a very

On the TV news I heard that Nicaragua had complained about the

I was not able to explain well to my good friend to make him less

When I saw the pictures of the draught in Etiopia.

I was walking along a subway when I saw a group of louts.  I was

I once was accused of falling in love with someone's girlfriend

When I was left alone at home one night by my brother.
Saw in the TV South Korea cheating in the Asian Olympic games.

I was with my girlfriend when some guys that I don't like made

When I do or say something inappropriate which hurts people close

My old boyfriend - yes the same one - asked me out. We had a good

interest.

When I had slept with a boy for the first time I felt ashamed for

When I answered to my mother with rudeness.

Saw my roommate messing up our room.
Unrealisation of the desired profession (aviator).

Climbing a mountain where the rocks were very loose. When we

When a classmate of ours knocked on our door at 2 o'clock in the

When I met a good friend of mine after a long time.
Not handing in homework in time.

When I had an argument with my grandfather the day my younger

While dining with some accquaintances I was asked something

Talkiing about the past happy hours with two friends at night in

One night I had to bike home all alone after a party. Then I
